nodes.text: This Neimoidian was a historic military commander.

This officer was known to wear a giant hat and rode a kaadu during a campaign.
He was a significant person in Neimoidian society and was granted a heroic portrait. This artwork came to hang in a gallery within Senator Lott Dod's palace on Cato Neimoidia.

This character was described as a "Napoleonic Neimoidian" in the episode guide. This is in reference to Napoleon Bonaparte, Emperor of France, whom the Neimoidien resembles. The painting itself is a reference to the classical portrait Napoleon Crossing the Alps by Jacques-Louis David.
